title: ‘True Test’ Coming for Bitcoin (BTC), Warns Bloomberg Analyst Mike McGlone – Here’s the Timeline
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence’s senior macro strategist Mike McGlone is warning that Bitcoin (BTC) will likely face a big test in the second half (2H) of 2023. McGlone tells his 58,800 Twitter followers that after a strong performance in the first half of the year (1H) Bitcoin will likely have to endure tough recessionary conditions during the next […]

The post ‘True Test’ Coming for Bitcoin (BTC), Warns Bloomberg Analyst Mike McGlone – Here’s the Timeline appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
